title: Head Drill Coach (no teaching assignment)
description: This Head Drill coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Paula Haws,  at paula.haws@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
